The news is overwhelming,
but it doesn't have to be.

AccuCheck takes the stress out of your scroll! With our premium AI, AccuCheck helps you identify fact vs. opinion, real vs. fake, and keeps you up to date with the latest news on your feed.

Paste the URL of an articles you're reading below and AccuCheck will tell you if the source is fact-based, opinion, or satire.

Marks the polarity of the article. Possible values: strong positive, positive, neutral, negative, strong negative, or no polarity.
Marks the subjectivity of the article. Possible values: objective or subjective.
Marks the agreement between the sentiments in the article. Possible values: agreement or disagreement.
Indicates the irony level of the article. Possible values: ironic or non-ironic.
